snippet: Italy's UniCredit is close to selling a new portion of its private equity holdings after a similar deal in 2013, a source close to the matter said on Sunday, as European banks shed non-core assets to strengthen their capital base....

headline.print_headline: UniCredit Close to Selling More Private Equity Holdings - Source
headline.main: UniCredit Close to Selling More Private Equity Holdings - Source

lead_paragraph: Italy's UniCredit is close to selling a new portion of its private equity holdings after a similar deal in 2013, a source close to the matter said on Sunday, as European banks shed non-core assets to strengthen their capital base.
